name: @teclead/search-module
description: An NPM module for the Teclead Search Service which can be used for Adobe AEM or other Content Management Systems.

scripts.build:project: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build && cp package.json ./dist && cp README.md ./dist && mkdir dist/lib && cp src/lib/synonyms.txt ./dist/lib/synonyms.txt
scripts.build:service: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build && cp package.json ./dist && cp README.md ./dist && mkdir dist/lib && cp src/lib/synonyms.txt ./dist/lib/synonyms.txt && rm -rf ../../ergo/search-service/node_modules/@teclead/search-module && cp -a ./dist ../../ergo/search-service/node_modules/@teclead/search-module

author: Teclead
